name: Step

properties.name: component
properties.description:
The component to render. You can inject the C8yStepper to manage steps or use the existing NgForm to validate the content of the form before the user can go on.

Example :
viewProviders: [{ provide: ControlContainer, useExisting: NgForm }]
properties.rawdescription:
The component to render. You can inject the C8yStepper to manage steps or use the
existing NgForm to validate the content of the form before the user can go on.

```js
viewProviders: [{ provide: ControlContainer, useExisting: NgForm }]
```

properties.name: injector
properties.description: The injector to use. If not set, default injector will be used.
properties.rawdescription: The injector to use. If not set, default injector will be used.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: High priority will show the step sooner, low priority will show the step later. All hooked step are ordered first by priority then by name.
properties.rawdescription:
High priority will show the step sooner, low priority will show the step later. All
hooked step are ordered first by priority then by name.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Marks the step as required to complete the stepper.
properties.rawdescription: Marks the step as required to complete the stepper.

properties.name: stepperId
properties.description: The id of the stepper outlet where the step should be attached to.
properties.rawdescription: The id of the stepper outlet where the step should be attached to.

description:
Steps of a stepper component.

Example :
providers: [{
  provide: HOOK_STEPPER,
  useValue: {
     id: Steppers.SETUP,
     label: 'Register devices',
     component: YourRegisterDeviceForm,
     priority: -1000
  },
  multi: true
}]
